ns8:component-version-script.description: Install Apache HTTP Server on Windows 2008 R2 SP1.
ns8:component-version-script.script: echo Agent Install Dir: %AGENTDIR% echo running as %USERDOMAIN%\%USERNAME% if exist "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" call "%AGENTDIR%\svservice.exe" attach apache_2.2.22.vmdk echo ERRORLEVEL is %ERRORLEVEL% exit /b 0

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2

ns8:component-version-script.description: Configure Apache HTTP Server on Windows 2008 R2 SP1.
Start Apache HTTP Server on Windows 2008 R2 SP1.

supported-os-details.exec-script: @echo off call %1 >%3 2>&1 if NOT %errorlevel% EQU 0 exit %errorlevel% set > %2
